description:
A feature-rich Spotify controller for GNOME Shell with a beautiful popup UI.

Key Features:
• Synchronized Lyrics (powered by lrclib.net)
• Ambient Backgrounds & Animated Vinyl Cover Art
• Unique Wavy Progress Slider with Seek support
• Fully Customizable: Fonts, Colors, Sizes, and Panel Layouts
• Scroll on panel indicator to change volume

This extension is not affiliated, funded, or in any way associated with Spotify.
name: Spotify Controller
